txt.en: Treasures have been stolen! It is suspected that the items were brought to Shakal-atrâd, in Elderslade, and hidden in the depths of the old watch-tower….\n\nYour mission is to recover stolen treasure, hidden within Shakal-atrâd.
You have been tasked with recovering stolen treasure, hidden within Shakal-atrâd.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Hórin for your reward!

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].\n\n'We have recently excavated lost dwarf-treasure from ruins near Gundabad! While on route here, the treasure was stolen! We believe those who stole the treasure may have hid in the old watch-post of Shakal-atrâd. We must recover that treasure, as it does not contain only valuables, it may contain lost history!'
You must find a way to breach a barrier to reach your mission objective.
Your mission is to recover stolen treasure, hidden within Shakal-atrâd.\n\nSpeak to Hórin to travel to Shakal-atrâd.
'Well done! With the treasure recovered, our lore-masters can study its contents! Perhaps it will shed some light on gaps in Gundabad's history.'
